name: Google Drive
description: Google Drive cloud storage platform for file management and collaboration

actions.name: Test Connection
actions.description: Test the connection to Google Drive and verify authentication

actions.name: Create File
actions.description: Create a new file in Google Drive

name.description: Name of the file to create

actions.name: Upload File
actions.description: Upload a file to Google Drive

fileId.description: ID of the file to retrieve

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return

fileId.description: ID of the file to download

format.description: Export format for Google Workspace files

folderId.description: ID of the folder to list (optional)

maxResults.description: Maximum number of files to return

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return

actions.name: Create Folder
actions.description: Create a new folder in Google Drive

actions.name: Move File
actions.description: Move a file to a different folder

fileId.description: ID of the file to move

newParentId.description: ID of the new parent folder

removeParents.description: Comma-separated list of parent IDs to remove

actions.name: Copy File
actions.description: Create a copy of a file

fileId.description: ID of the file to copy

parentFolderId.description: ID of the parent folder for the copy

fileId.description: ID of the file to delete

actions.name: Share File
actions.description: Share a file with users or make it public

fileId.description: ID of the file to share

emailAddress.description: Email address of the user to share with

actions.name: Get File Permissions
actions.description: Get sharing permissions for a file

actions.name: Update File Metadata
actions.description: Update file metadata like name, description

fileId.description: ID of the file to update

actions.name: Delete Permission
actions.description: Remove a permission from a file

permissionId.description: ID of the permission to remove

actions.name: Update Permission
actions.description: Update a permission on a file

triggers.name: File Created
triggers.description: Triggered when a new file is created

triggers.name: File Updated
triggers.description: Triggered when a file is modified

triggers.name: File Shared
triggers.description: Triggered when a file is shared
